title: Wukong 'Q' Glitch
body:
**Wukong 'Q' Glitch**
I have encountered a glitch in which when I am hitting a jungle creature and activate my 'Q' as Wukong then select another jungle creature to attack before the 'Q' action completed instead of using his enhanced basic attack (Q) on the second creep he waves his pole above his head and looks between the two creeps for a second or two before striking the second creep (this is quite annoying and I was wondering if anybody else had encountered the glitch or if Riot was aware of it, ect). 
- NiftyNinja

replies.body: Why does it do it then?

it happens to me in lane, but only recently.
Still, I don't think it is a bug, it's just that you didn't let the Q animation finish before clicking to the next target.
